name: assistants_chat_widget
description: 1. Install dependencies:    ```bash    npm install express node-fetch dotenv cors    ``` 2. Create `.env`:    ```env    OPENAI_API_KEY=your_openai_key    ASSISTANT_ID=your_assistant_id    AUTH_TOKEN=changeme    PUBLIC_ORIGIN=http://localhost:5500    ``` 3. Run server:    ```bash    node server.js    ``` 4. Serve `frontend/` via static hosting or CMS.
